article_title: Blue Cross delays troubled technology for NC State Health Plan
article_text:
More than 850 customer complaints have been lodged with the NC Department of Insurance

High call volume, over 3,400 calls in past month, indicate Blue Cross’s technology woes are ongoing

NC State Health Plan’s 685,000 members won’t be transferred to troubled software until kinks worked out

article_metadata.news-keywords: Blue Cross, Blue Shield, Department, Insurance, Facets, Topaz, Affordable Care Act, Obamacare, ACA
article_metadata.description: Blue Cross and Blue Shield’s unprecedented technology problems, which the company had previously hoped to resolve within a week, are now dragging into their second month, with no indication as to when all customers will be able to count on purchasing health insurance that activates on time without complications.
article_metadata.title: Blue Cross delays troubled technology for NC State Health Plan | News & Observer
